rows.label: tev072601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask On'tonam about Orphean Technologies' director.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask On'tonam if anything is troubling him.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_SEL0031
rows.name: Ask On'tonam about the mech Goetia uses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_SEL0051
rows.name: Ask On'tonam about the battle with the Zu Pharg.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_SEL0071
rows.name: Ask On'tonam about Orphean Technologies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask On'tonam about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_SEL2021
rows.name: Ask On'tonam about recent developments.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0001
rows.name:
We'll be providing technology to you humans through
our state-of-the-art arms manufacturing company,
Orphean Technologies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0002
rows.name:
It doesn't really matter who calls himself the director,
but I ended up taking on the role.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0003
rows.name:
When you equip yourself with gear comprised of our
technologies, you can evade any attack with ease.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0004
rows.name:
And our range of ether- and gravity-based weapons
will surely prove effective against a variety of enemies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0005
rows.name:
I am certain our products will benefit you in battle,
so please give them a try.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0010
rows.name:
We Orphe are connected through our Ovah.
Even when we are apart, our paths are the same.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0011
rows.name:
But the Ganglion, and you humans, do not possess
a share of the Ovah within your bodies.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0012
rows.name:
Do you understand how frightening it is to have beings
beside you whose thoughts you cannot comprehend?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0013
rows.name:
We fear a potential future where you humans abandon
the treaty and turn your weapons on us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0014
rows.name:
If that happens, the Orphe would surely perish.
But we would see that you pay appropriately.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0019
rows.name: I was most impressed with your victory over Almandal![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0020
rows.name:
The Ganglion had all of our Orphe technicians
assigned to work on that machine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0021
rows.name:
We had believed that human Skells would be no
match for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0022
rows.name:
But I suppose we can chalk that up to a difference
in pilot skill. Our technology was probably too much
for that squid woman to handle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0027
rows.name:
The Ganglion had all of the technicians in its service
working hard to complete that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0028
rows.name:
It might not be an exaggeration to say that it was the
most horrific weapon of mass eradication anywhere
in the galaxy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0029
rows.name: And to think that you destroyed it...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0030
rows.name:
If I'm being perfectly honest, I've come to believe that
humanity is far more terrifying than the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0035
rows.name:
We Orphe have developed countless weapons since
arriving on this planet. Yet our technology was never
developed with the intention of causing harm.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0036
rows.name:
Our technology gradually developed over our eons of
history as a way to increase our odds of survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0037
rows.name:
When we are finally free of our enemies, I would like
to return to focusing on the device that puts our
technology to its original intended use.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0038
rows.name:
And that is transforming barren wastelands into lush,
green paradises...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG0039
rows.name:
I speak, of course, of the all-purpose Orphean
super-planter![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG1001
rows.name:
I must admit that allying with an Ovah-less species
like yours made me very uneasy at first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG1002
rows.name:
But through your cumulative efforts to cooperate
with our species, you humans have proven yourselves
more than trustworthy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG1003
rows.name:
In anticipation of the possibility that we might be
betrayed, I made contingency plans to obliterate this
entire area.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG1004
rows.name:
But as that possibility no longer exists,
I will see to it that such plans are scrapped.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG2001
rows.name:
Everyone who was ensnared by Run'tonam's dangerous
ideas has died along with her.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG2002
rows.name:
Now that the truth is known, all those who were
deceived by her ridiculous vision of an anti-Ovah
revolution seem to have come to their senses.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG2003
rows.name:
Now we must renew our bonds of unity and strengthen
them even further for the sake of our species' survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG2004
rows.name:
We must resume living our lives in absolute deference
to the voices of our Ovah![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG2005
rows.name:
Thank you for informing us of that fool's fate.
It is because of you that we are able to return to our
rightful way of life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG3001
rows.name:
We have always entrusted everything to our Ovah,
but now we must attain a consciousness that transcends
the Ovah itself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG3002
rows.name:
It will not be easy, but now that we have acceded to
Run'tonam's final wish, I believe we will be able to
begin the process of change.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG3003
rows.name: Thank you for bringing her right hand back to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev072601_MSG3004
rows.name:
We will embrace our new future and work hand in
hand with humanity to survive on this world![ST:wait ]
